title: Ep10 Blood Spatter
description: The gals gush over bloodstains and the ways in which sprays, spurts, pools, and trails are used in forensic investigations. Topics include a shady gynecologist, whimsical blood terminology, and whether a dingo really did eat that baby. This episode is paired with Bloody Marys, so mix one up, wipe the spatter off your shoes, grab a protractor, and tune in.
itunes:author: Wine & Crime Podcast
dc:creator: Wine & Crime Podcast
